name: Binding III
description:
A series of alternative realities exploring different states of the crypto and NFT community. Thanks to the combination of animation and sound accompaniment, the listener's consciousness take on various incarnations, ranging from an extraterrestrial civilization to an object placed inside a box, passively observing the world. Whatever form consciousness takes, there is always awareness inside the gates of space. Looking at this composition, we strive to listen deeper to the world around us and to each other.

What is included in the purchase of NFT: 
- Animation 33 sec. 
- 2x Wallpapers, 4K. Ready for print (300 DPI)
